abstract_summ: The coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic is an emerging threat worldwide . Diabetes, osteoporosis, rheumatoid arthritis, substance use, and schizophrenia showed significant association with the disease . Diabetes (ORR), hypertension, chronic lower respiratory disease, chronic renal failure, and end-stage renal failure were associated with severe cases . Health care workers should be more careful while diagnosing and treating patients with these factors .
